roadmap.name: To learn that the unconscious mind is a “habit mind”; that it operates through symbols, patterns and governs a large portion of our behavior.
To learn how to recognize the effects of the unconscious mind, and how to re-pattern it.
To understand the difference between the conscious and the unconscious mind, and how they work together.
To understand how the unconscious represents preconceived beliefs, expectations, relationship patterns, patterns of social interaction.
